title: Frequently Asked Questions - GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
description: Common questions and answers about GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum

questions.question: What is GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
questions.answer: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is a 10% Vitamin C product with Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, designed for Oily, Combination.

questions.question: What are the key ingredients in GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
questions.answer: The key ingredients in GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum include Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid.

questions.question: Are there any side effects with GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
questions.answer: Some users may experience mild tingling for sensitive skin. Always patch test before first use.

questions.question: Is GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum safe for sensitive skin?
questions.answer: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is formulated for Oily, Combination. Some users may experience mild tingling for sensitive skin, so patch test before first use.

questions.question: How do I use GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
questions.answer: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

questions.question: When should I use GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
questions.answer: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum should be used in the morning.

questions.question: What is the price of GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
questions.answer: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is available for ₹699.

questions.question: What benefits does GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum provide?
questions.answer: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum provides Brightening, Fades dark spots.

questions.question: How does GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum compare to other similar products?
questions.answer: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum offers Brightening, Fades dark spots with Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid at ₹699.
